email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We are looking to transport 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam on CIF terms. Could you provide a vessel offer and a freight rate? We need a laycan of 25-30 October.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel SEA HORIZON, DWT 82,000, LOA 229m, available for your cargo. The starting freight rate is $22/MT. Laycan 25-30 October is workable. Let me know if this suits your needs.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the offer. $22/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you improve the rate to $20/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Given the volume, I can adjust the rate to $20.50/MT. Demurrage is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 96 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

$20.50/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the SEA HORIZON with a laycan of 25-30 October and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Emily
